mapper.select: select uno from user where uid = #{uid}

select ord.tid,ord.sno,ord.uno,ord.payment_method_type,ord.approved_at,oinfo.mno, oinfo.quantity ,psmenu.mname,psmenu.mprice ,pstore.sname from gorany.order ord
join gorany.order_info oinfo on ord.tid=oinfo.tid
join gorany.partner_store_menu psmenu on ord.sno=psmenu.sno
join gorany.partner_store pstore on ord.sno=pstore.sno
where ord.tid=#{tid}
where ord.tid!='' and ord.uno=#{uno}
and oinfo.mno=psmenu.mno order by approved_at desc

select userorder.*, sname from (select orderall.*, mname, mprice, fname, uuid, upload_path from (select sno, uno, payment_method_type, approved_at, status, partner_order_id, token, info.* from gorany.order ord join gorany.order_info info on ord.tid = info.tid) orderall join gorany.partner_store_menu menu on orderall.mno = menu.mno) userorder join gorany.partner_store store on userorder.sno = store.sno where userorder.uno = #{uno} order by approved_at desc limit 15;
mapper.update: update gorany.order set token = #{token} where tid = #{tid}
